column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Great ambiance! Very stylish
column3: and elegant dining area. This is an ideal place to take someone for a nice night out. The food was also top notch. Oysters were fantastic. My salmon was done perfectly. I loved all the sides
column4: but especially the butternut squash. I don't eat red meat
column5: but others said the steaks were excellent. The service was good
column6: but I think given the atmosphere and prices at Bavette's
column7: it should have been a bit better. There were a couple times when it was hard to track down our server.
